meanings.definition: The process or period of flowering.
meanings.sent1: The florescence of the cherry blossoms brought color to the park.
meanings.sent2: Spring is the season of florescence when flowers bloom everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The florescence of the garden made the bees work overtime!
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting reached its florescence, capturing the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The florescence of the roses in full bloom was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The state or period of flourishing.
meanings.sent1: The company experienced a period of florescence after launching the new product.
meanings.sent2: During the Renaissance, art and culture were in a state of florescence.
meanings.sent3: The florescence of the business was evident in the growing number of customers.
meanings.sent4: In the golden age of cinema, Hollywood was in a state of florescence.
meanings.sent5: The florescence of her career came after years of hard work and dedication.
